Licensed Immigration Consultant in Whitehorse Yukon

With the assistance of a licenced Canadian immigration consultant in Whitehorse, Yukon, you can immigrate to Canada as an international student, a foreign skilled worker, or a business owner. What is Yukon Nominee Program?

The Yukon Nominee Program provides candidates with immigration options from within and outside Canada. To be eligible for the Yukon Nominee Program, you must possess a year-round, full-time job offer from a Yukon employer qualified to hire you and satisfy the requirements for your application stream.

These are the main streams under the Yukon Nominee Program:

  • Yukon Critical Impact Worker: Employers looking to hire foreign labour for their Yukon-based businesses can take advantage of this stream.
  • Yukon Skilled Worker: For qualified workers in the NOC TEER 0, 1, or 2 positions with relevant work experience.
  • Yukon Express Entry: For qualified candidates who meet the language, work and educational requirements for one of the Federal Express Entry programs.
  • Yukon Community Program: For qualified employers and professionals residing, in particular participating communities in Yukon Territory.
  • Yukon Business Nominee Program: For business owners and investors seeking to start and operate a company in Yukon in order to achieve permanent residency.
